body.p:
Independence
Oct 17th 1864
To his Excellency Govr Bramblette,

I herewith tender my resignation as Majistrate of the 3d Majisterial district of Kenton County,,, and recomend to you as my sucessor, Aaron Striger; who is a good Loyal Citizen and in every way capable of discharging the duties of the office
We the undersigned citizens of the 3d Majisterial district fully concur in the above recommendation

This 12th day of October 1864
L Shaun P J K c c
C W Cain
B Wilshine
L. A. Wilson
L. Brbymer D. S.
G Higgins c k c
Moses West
E. J. McCollum
You will please attend to this at the earliest time as the present incumbent is about to remove from the state.

Kenton County
Justice Peace
Resignation of Wm Brown accepted & Aaron Striger apptd
15th Oct/64
